text: the chicken wings were so deliciously savoury that i didnt get to take a pic of it before it was devoured by my family! the salsa chicken & seafood pizzas were the yummiest!

Thought you can't go wrong with Pizza. Quality dropped like mad, won't recommend to anyone. Disappointed Christmas meal.

See the colour of the crust, was very tough and very bland

Ordered pizzas and garlic bread for dinner last week. The super spicy chicken pizza was super salty. Instead of spicy, the whole pizza tasted like someone poured a bottle of salt into the pizza rather. Tried another slice and it was the same saltiness. Had to throw the rest of the pizza away as it was way too salty. Very disappointing experience as we've been ordering from Rite Pizza for years and been recommending to our family and frens :(

Ordered pizza first time from here.

This is the worst pizza I ever ate. Soggy and the taste was so bad, I only ate half of it.

Never order from here again.
The food is great and the service is really nice but the issue is that the seats are shared with the other 2 nearby restaurants
